concept.title: JCE for AES-256 encryption
concept.shortdesc: If you use AES-256 encryption with your Oracle JVM, install the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy File on all machines where the Data Collector runs.

conbody.p: You can download the JCE from the following location: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html.
For JCE Policy File installation instructions, see the README.txt file included in the jce_policy-x.zip file.
